amendment.description: To strike the provision prohibiting a court from staying the removal of an alien in certain circumstances.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4083 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 45. Record Vote Number: 153.

action.text: Amendment SA 4083 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S5146-5153, S5188; text: CR S5146) To strike the provision prohibiting a court from staying the removal of an alien in certain circumstances.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4083 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 45. Record Vote Number: 153.
